API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.math.FastMath

type
class
Fast trigonometry functions using cache table and precalculated data. Based on Michael Kraus implementation.

Static Variables

HALF_PI(inline,null) : Float

Math constant pi/2.

PRECISION(inline,null) : Int

The precision of the lookup table.

The bigger this number, the more entries there are in the lookup table, which gives more accurate results.

PRECISION_DIV_2PI(inline,null) : Float

PRECISION / TWO_PI.

PRECISION_S(inline,null) : Int

PRECISION - 1.

TWO_PI(inline,null) : Float

Math constant pi*2.

cos(inline,null) : radians : Float -> Float

Returns the cosine of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.

initialize(default,method) : Void -> Void

initialized(default,method) : Void -> Bool

sin(inline,null) : radians : Float -> Float

Returns the sine of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.

tan(inline,null) : radians : Float -> Float

Returns the tangent of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.
